BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. VESSEL FAROL BEACH, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED.
   LAST KNOWN POSITION 22-59.00S 042-02.08W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1540/10.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1576/10(36,51), VESSEL LOCATED SAFE.
